casebody.data:
Samuel MARKOVICH and Diamond Properties Northshore, L.L.C.
v.
Donald J. VILLERE, Individually and in His Official Capacity as Mayor of the City of Mandeville; and Christopher Brown, Individually and in His Official Capacity as Building Official for the Department of Planning and Development, City of Mandeville NO. 2019-C-0500 Supreme Court of Louisiana. May 20, 2019 Denied. HUGHES, J., would grant.
